channel.title: R Code on Allie Choate
channel.description: Recent content in R Code on Allie Choate

item.title: Free R-Resources On the Web!
item.description: Here are some links to awesome free R resources that I’ve come across. Many of these tutortials or books I routinely use myself, and have found extremley helpful for learning R, as well as running more advanced statistical models!

item.title: Psychometrics Material (Homework Code)
item.description: Here is a list of R-code/R-Markdown files I have created for homework templates for our Psychometrics course at USF! To keep things clean, I’ve attached links that will take you to a seperate Rpub file where I have posted the Rmarkdown files.
